feature_model.name: Monitor_Engine_System

meta.data: This feature model describes the possible features of a simple monitor engine system

Yves Bontemps, Patrick Heymans, Pierre-Yves Schobbens, and Jean-Christophe Trigaux. Semantics of FODA feature diagrams. In Tomi Mannisto and Jan Bosch, editors, Proceedings SPLC 2004 Workshop on Software Variability Management for Product Derivation – Towards Tool Support, pages 48–58. Technical Report 6 – HUT-SoberIT-C6, August 2004.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r monitor_engine_system :m engine_performance :m temperatures :o colant :m oil :m engine :m transmission :m rpm (rpm) :m exhaust_level_temp :m fuel_consumption :m measures :g [1,1] : l_km : gallon_mile :m methods :g [1,*] : distance : type_of_driving : drive (drive)
